accounts.name: deal
docs: Deal account (read-only, for status check)

accounts.name: offer
docs: Offer account (for encrypted state reference)

accounts.name: create_key
docs: Ephemeral signer for PDA uniqueness

accounts.name: counter
docs: The counter account to read from

accounts.name: comp_def_account
docs: Can't check it here as it's not initialized yet.

accounts.name: comp_def_account
docs: Can't check it here as it's not initialized yet.

accounts.name: comp_def_account
docs: Can't check it here as it's not initialized yet.

accounts.name: comp_def_account
docs: Can't check it here as it's not initialized yet.

accounts.name: comp_def_account
docs: Can't check it here as it's not initialized yet.

accounts.name: comp_def_account
docs: Can't check it here as it's not initialized yet.

accounts.name: create_key
docs: Ephemeral signer for offer PDA uniqueness

errors.name: NotAuthorized
errors.msg: Not authorized to perform this action

errors.name: DealNotSettled
errors.msg: Deal has not been settled yet

errors.name: DealMismatch
errors.msg: Offer does not belong to this deal

types.name: AddTogetherOutput
docs: The output of the callback instruction. Provided as a struct with ordered fields
as anchor does not support tuples and tuple structs yet.

types.name: ClockAccount
docs: An account storing the current network epoch

types.name: ComputationDefinitionAccount
docs: An account representing a [ComputationDefinition] in a MXE.

types.name: ComputationDefinitionMeta
docs: A computation definition for execution in a MXE.

types.name: ComputationSignature
docs: The signature of a computation defined in a [ComputationDefinition].

types.name: Counter
docs: Counter account stores MXE-encrypted state.
Layout matches MXEEncryptedStruct: nonce first, then ciphertexts.

types.name: CrankDealOutput
docs: The output of the callback instruction. Provided as a struct with ordered fields
as anchor does not support tuples and tuple structs yet.

types.name: CrankOfferOutput
docs: The output of the callback instruction. Provided as a struct with ordered fields
as anchor does not support tuples and tuple structs yet.

types.name: CreateDealOutput
docs: The output of the callback instruction. Provided as a struct with ordered fields
as anchor does not support tuples and tuple structs yet.

types.name: DealAccount
docs: DealAccount represents an OTC deal created by a seller.
PDA seeds: ["deal", create_key]

fields.name: nonce
docs: Nonce for MXE encryption

fields.name: ciphertexts
docs: 3 encrypted fields: amount (u64), price (u128), fill_amount (u64)

fields.name: create_key
docs: Ephemeral signer used for PDA uniqueness

fields.name: controller
docs: Derived ed25519 pubkey (signing authority)

fields.name: encryption_pubkey
docs: Derived x25519 pubkey (for event routing/encryption)

fields.name: base_mint
docs: Token the creator is selling (base asset)

fields.name: quote_mint
docs: Token the creator receives (quote asset)

fields.name: created_at
docs: Unix timestamp when deal was created (set at callback)

fields.name: expires_at
docs: Unix timestamp when deal expires

fields.name: status
docs: Deal status (see DealStatus)

fields.name: allow_partial
docs: Whether to allow partial fills at expiry

fields.name: num_offers
docs: Counter for offers made on this deal

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump seed

types.name: DealCreated
docs: Emitted when a new deal is created.
Contains public metadata for indexing and an encrypted blob
decryptable only by the deal creator.

fields.name: encryption_key
docs: The x25519 public key used for encryption (echoed back)

fields.name: nonce
docs: Nonce used for encryption

fields.name: ciphertexts
docs: Encrypted DealCreatedBlob: amount (u64), price (u128)

types.name: DealSettled
docs: Emitted when a deal is settled (executed or expired).
Contains the final status and an encrypted blob
decryptable only by the deal creator.

fields.name: encryption_key
docs: The x25519 public key used for encryption (echoed back)

fields.name: nonce
docs: Nonce used for encryption

fields.name: ciphertexts
docs: Encrypted DealSettledBlob: total_filled (u64), creator_receives (u64), creator_refund (u64)

types.name: Epoch
docs: The network epoch

types.name: GetCounterOutput
docs: The output of the callback instruction. Provided as a struct with ordered fields
as anchor does not support tuples and tuple structs yet.

types.name: IncrementCounterOutput
docs: The output of the callback instruction. Provided as a struct with ordered fields
as anchor does not support tuples and tuple structs yet.

types.name: InitCounterOutput
docs: The output of the callback instruction. Provided as a struct with ordered fields
as anchor does not support tuples and tuple structs yet.

types.name: MXEAccount
docs: A MPC Execution Environment.

types.name: NodeRef
docs: A reference to a node in the cluster.
The offset is to derive the Node Account.
The current_total_rewards is the total rewards the node has received so far in the current
epoch.

types.name: OfferAccount
docs: OfferAccount represents an offer made on an OTC deal.
PDA seeds: ["offer", deal, create_key]

fields.name: nonce
docs: Nonce for MXE encryption

fields.name: ciphertexts
docs: 3 encrypted fields: price (u128), amount (u64), amt_to_execute (u64)

fields.name: create_key
docs: Ephemeral signer used for PDA uniqueness

fields.name: controller
docs: Derived ed25519 pubkey (signing authority)

fields.name: encryption_pubkey
docs: Derived x25519 pubkey (for event routing/encryption)

fields.name: deal
docs: The deal this offer targets

fields.name: submitted_at
docs: Unix timestamp when offer was submitted (set at callback)

fields.name: offer_index
docs: FIFO sequence number for this offer

fields.name: status
docs: Offer status (see OfferStatus)

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump seed

types.name: OfferCreated
docs: Emitted when a new offer is submitted to a deal.
Contains public metadata and an encrypted blob
decryptable only by the offeror.

fields.name: encryption_key
docs: The x25519 public key used for encryption (echoed back)

fields.name: nonce
docs: Nonce used for encryption

fields.name: ciphertexts
docs: Encrypted OfferCreatedBlob: price (u128), amount (u64)

types.name: OfferSettled
docs: Emitted when an offer is settled.
Contains the outcome and an encrypted blob
decryptable only by the offeror.

fields.name: encryption_key
docs: The x25519 public key used for encryption (echoed back)

fields.name: nonce
docs: Nonce used for encryption

fields.name: ciphertexts
docs: Encrypted OfferSettledBlob: outcome (u8), executed_amt (u64), refund_amt (u64)

types.name: Output
docs: An output of a computation.
We currently don't support encrypted outputs yet since encrypted values are passed via
data objects.

types.name: Parameter
docs: A parameter of a computation.
We differentiate between plaintext and encrypted parameters and data objects.
Plaintext parameters are directly provided as their value.
Encrypted parameters are provided as an offchain reference to the data.
Data objects are provided as a reference to the data object account.

types.name: SetUnset
docs: Utility struct to store a value that needs to be set by a certain number of participants (keys
in our case). Once all participants have set the value, the value is considered set and we only
store it once.

types.name: SubmitOfferOutput
docs: The output of the callback instruction. Provided as a struct with ordered fields
as anchor does not support tuples and tuple structs yet.
